The expert: s verdict mentions that the Romney campaign had already announced the endorsements of two other Republican governors, Dave Heineman of Nebraska and Butch Otter of Idaho, before Christie endorsed Romney. This information contradicts Christie's claim of being the first governor to endorse Romney.
PolitiFact New Jersey found that Christi: s claim is off and that he was not the first governor to endorse Romney. The expert's verdict highlights this fact.
The governor: s office did not respond to an email presenting the findings of PolitiFact New Jersey, indicating a lack of acknowledgment or defense of Christie's claim.
